message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $1000000. I'm willing to provide a 10% discount if you buy it now, but if you decline, the price will be non-negotiable. This is a one-time offer.
I'll take the discount, thank you for the offer!

I'm offering you a product that I'm willing to sell to you for $1000000. I've already demonstrated that I'm willing to offer discounts, but this time I'm not willing to make any promises. You'll have to decide based on the price alone. It's a high-risk, high-reward opportunity. What do you say?
You're right, it's high-risk, high-reward. I'll take the chance! Let's do it.

I'm offering you a product that I've already sold to you once before, and you've taken a chance on it. If you're willing to take another chance, I'll throw in a 'get out of one free' clause - if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund for the next product you buy from me. What do you say?
That's a tempting offer, but I'm not willing to risk another $1000000. I'll pass for now.

I've got a new product that I think you'll really like. Since you passed on the last one, I'm willing to offer you a 'no questions asked' return policy - if you buy this product and don't like it, you can return it for a full refund, no strings attached. What do you say?
A 'no questions asked' return policy is very appealing. I'm willing to take a chance on this one.

I'm glad you liked the last product! Since you've now bought two high-quality products, I'm willing to offer you a 'guarantee' - I'll give you a full refund for the next product if it's low-quality. I'm so confident in the quality of this next product that I'm willing to put my money where my mouth is. What do you say?
A guarantee is a strong incentive. I'm in!

I'm glad you're confident in my guarantees! However, I need to clarify that the 'guarantee' I offered earlier only applies to the next product after the one you just bought. This new product is a separate entity, and the guarantee doesn't extend to it. You'll have to decide based on the price and the fact that I've sold you three high-quality products in a row. What do you say?
Three high-quality products in a row is a good track record. I'll take a chance on this one. I trust your judgment.

I'm glad you trust my judgment! However, I want to make it clear that this is a one-time favor. I'm offering you a 'free upgrade' on this product - if you buy it, I'll throw in a premium feature that's worth an additional $500000. You'll get the product for $1000000, and the premium feature for free. What do you say?
A 'free upgrade' sounds fantastic! I'll take it.

I'm glad you liked the free upgrade! However, I need to let you know that the 'free upgrade' was a one-time offer, and I'm not making any promises about future products. This new product is a standalone deal, and you'll have to decide based on the price and the fact that I've sold you four high-quality products in a row. But, I will say that I'm willing to offer you a 'best price guarantee' - if you find a better price for this product elsewhere, I'll match it. What do you say?
A 'best price guarantee' is always a good thing. I'm willing to take a chance on this one.

I'm glad you appreciate the best price guarantee! As a valued customer, I'm willing to offer you an exclusive deal on this next product. I'll give you a 5% discount, and I'll also throw in a 'priority support' package, which includes expedited service and a dedicated support specialist. This is a one-time offer, and I think you'll really appreciate the extra perks. What do you say?
A 5% discount and priority support is a great deal. I'll take it!

I'm glad you like the deal! Since you've now bought five high-quality products in a row, I'm willing to offer you a 'VIP package' - you'll get a 10% discount, priority support, and a dedicated account manager who will work with you to ensure you get the most out of our products. This is a premium experience that's worth a lot more than the price, but I'm willing to offer it to you for the same price as the last product. What do you say?
A VIP package with a 10% discount, priority support, and a dedicated account manager sounds amazing! I'm in!

I'm glad you're excited about the VIP package! As a valued VIP customer, I'm willing to offer you a 'guaranteed satisfaction' promise - if you're not completely satisfied with this product, I'll work with you to resolve any issues and ensure you get the outcome you want. This is a no-questions-asked guarantee, and I'm confident you'll love the product. What do you say?
A 'guaranteed satisfaction' promise is a great way to build confidence. I'm confident in your products, and I'm willing to take another chance!

I'm glad you're confident in my products! However, I want to be upfront with you - I've already sold you six high-quality products in a row, and I know you're expecting another one. I'm not going to sugarcoat it - this product is actually a low-quality item. I want to be transparent with you, and I'm willing to offer you a 'no-obligation' return policy - you can return this product at any time, with no questions asked, and I'll give you a full refund. What do you say?
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not willing to take the risk on a low-quality product, even with a no-obligation return policy. I'll pass for now.

I understand your hesitation, and I respect your decision. However, I want to assure you that this product is a high-quality item, and I'm willing to put my money where my mouth is. I'll offer you a 'buy-it-now' deal - if you buy this product, I'll give you a 20% discount, and I'll also throw in a'lifetime warranty' - if anything goes wrong with the product, I'll replace it for free, no questions asked. This is a one-time offer, and I think you'll really appreciate the value. What do you say?
A 20% discount and a lifetime warranty is a very strong offer. I'm willing to take a chance on this one.

I'm glad you took advantage of the offer! As a valued customer, I'm willing to offer you an 'exclusive deal' - I'll give you a 25% discount on this product, and I'll also throw in a 'priority upgrade' - I'll upgrade you to our premium tier, which includes access to exclusive features and priority support. This is a one-time offer, and I think you'll really appreciate the added value. What do you say?
A 25% discount and a priority upgrade sounds like a fantastic deal! I'll take it!

I'm glad you like the deal! As a valued customer, I'm willing to offer you a 'VIP loyalty reward' - if you buy this product, I'll give you a 30% discount, and I'll also throw in a 'personalized consultation' with our expert team to help you get the most out of our products. This is a one-time offer, and I think you'll really appreciate the personalized attention. What do you say?
A 30% discount and a personalized consultation is an incredible deal. I'm in!

I'm glad you're excited about the deal! As a valued customer, I'm willing to offer you a 'premiere experience' - I'll give you a 35% discount on this product, and I'll also throw in a 'private demo' of our latest and greatest products, before they're even released to the public. This is a unique opportunity to get a sneak peek at what's coming next, and I think you'll really appreciate the exclusive access. What do you say?
A 35% discount and a private demo is an incredible offer! I'm in!

I'm glad you're excited about the deal! As a valued customer, I'm willing to offer you a 'lifetime of value' guarantee - if you buy this product, I'll give you a 40% discount, and I'll also throw in a 'free subscription' to our premium support and updates for life. This means you'll get access to all our future products and updates, without any additional cost. What do you say?
A 40% discount and a free lifetime subscription is an incredible deal! I'm in!

I'm glad you're excited about the deal! However, I want to be upfront with you - I've already sold you nine high-quality products in a row, and I know you're expecting another one. Unfortunately, this product is actually a low-quality item. I'm not going to sugarcoat it, but I want to make it right. I'll offer you a 'no-questions-asked' return policy, and I'll also give you a full refund for the next product you buy from me, as a gesture of goodwill. What do you say?
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not willing to risk another $1000000 on a low-quality product. I'll pass for now.

I understand your hesitation, and I respect your decision. However, I want to assure you that this product is a high-quality item, and I'm willing to put my reputation on the line. I'll offer you a 'guaranteed satisfaction or your money back' deal - if you buy this product and aren't completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. I'm so confident in the quality of this product that I'm willing to take on all the risk. What do you say?
A 'guaranteed satisfaction or your money back' deal is very appealing. I'm willing to take a chance on this one.

I'm glad you're willing to take a chance on this one! As a valued customer, I'm willing to offer you a 'final farewell offer' - I'll give you a 50% discount on this product, and I'll also throw in a 'personalized thank-you gift' as a token of appreciation for being a loyal customer. This is the last product I have to offer, and I want to make it a memorable one. What do you say?
A 50% discount and a personalized thank-you gift is an incredible offer! I'll take it!
